response.job_title: Project Manager at ABO Wind | Renewable Energy | Electrical Engineering | Regulation | M.Sc. in Electrical Engineering | Master in Finance Management
response.summary: M.Sc. and B.Sc. in Electrical Engineering from Universidad Nacional de Colombia and Master in Finance Management from EAFIT University. His interest is electrical planning, regulation, research, development, and innovation  (R+D+i) area; his current job line is renewable energy and regulation. He has new ideas in order to improve existing technologies and society. In addition, he learns every day in each scenario where he is involved. His goal is to link academy, industry, and society in Colombia to enhance the country welfare.
response.skills: Project Appraisal, Project valuation, Corporate Finance, Energy Regulation, PPA, Renewable Energy, Interdisciplinary Collaboration, Research, Academic Publishing, University Teaching, Team Leadership, Analytical Skills, Teamwork, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Gestión de proyectos, Planificación estratégica, Ingeniería eléctrica, Energía

profile_positions.description:
To ensure electrical connection viability of renewable generation projects in Colombia from connection study to negotiate connection agreements.

Coordinate and review engineering deliveries required for permissions (easements, environmental license, construction license, among others).

Coordinate with other areas about deliveries of each milestone.

Coordinate with the team to fulfill Colombian electrical regulation (technical, energy sales, procedures, among others).

Assessing alternatives technically and financially for getting whole permissions.

Review and implementation of existing/new laws in electrical sector into the company.

Coordinate electrical topics for construction of two solar farms.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

company.name: EBSA - Empresa de Energía de Boyacá

profile_positions.company: EBSA - Empresa de Energía de Boyacá
profile_positions.description:
Planning and leadership  of  project “EBSA Inteligente” that is an initiative related to implement
smart grids in EBSA’s area; starting with EBSA's smart grids strategical planning (vision, strategic plan and road map).  Likewise, planning, and technical and financial assessment of different kinds of projects of regional transmission and  local distribution system, and renewable energy in Boyacá. Analysis and review of regulations in electric sector.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Planning Engineer

company.name: EBSA - Empresa de Energía de Boyacá

profile_positions.company: EBSA - Empresa de Energía de Boyacá
profile_positions.description:
Planning and leadership  of  project “EBSA Inteligente” that is an initiative related to  implement
Smart Grids in EBSA’s grid.  Likewise,  planning and financial assessment of different kinds 
of  projects of regional transmission and  local  distribution  system, and renewable energy  in 
Boyacá.  Furthermore,  programming  skill  was  enhanced;  as  a  result,  time  of  realizing 
connection studies  decreased  from 3 months to 2 months  per project. At the same time, 
human work decreased 40% in simulation of scenarios in ETAP. Analysis and review of regulations in electric sector.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Planning Engineer - Professional under mission / Prof. en misión Planeamiento Eléctrico

profile_positions.description:
Reading, curiosity, learning, analyzing, planning, and other skills needed to research on new 
topics  and  technologies  were  developed  in  different  fields  related  to  smart  grids  in  the 
National Laboratory of Smart Grids of Universidad Nacional de Colombia “LAB+i”. Besides, 
interpersonal  skills  were  developed  supporting  and  establishing  a  communication  way 
between  companies  and  LAB+i.  Writing  was  improved;  for  this  reason,  there  are  3
conference papers  (in Canada, Mexico, and Japan)  and 3  journal papers  in international 
academic databases.
profile_positions.title: Researcher / Investigador Grupo Electrical Machines and Drives (EM&D) - Prestación de servicios

related to photovoltaic systems

company.name: ABO Wind
company.description:
Founded in 1996, ABO Wind is among Europe’s leading developers of renewable energy projects. We plan, build, operate and maintain wind and solar farms as well as hybrid energy, battery storage, and hydrogen projects in 16 countries on 4 continents. More than 1,000 colleagues contribute towards climate protection and a sustainable energy supply. ABO Wind realises projects with a total annual investment of about 500 million euros. To date, ABO Wind has realised projects with a total capacity of about 5 gigawatts and constructed around half of these.

We are looking for smart, creative and decisive minds, who are excited about the opportunities and prospects of renewable energies. Our flat hierarchy and interdisciplinary teams enable everyone to make the most of their skills, evolve and cocreate the company’s strategy. Our company culture is all about openness and accountability – amongst each other as well as towards clients and business partners.

ABO Wind is globally successful and growing in the fast-paced and dynamic environment of renewables. Our strategy is an early entry in emerging markets, boosted by cooperations with local partners. Internationally, we are looking for motivated staff in France, Finland, Spain, Ireland, United Kingdom, Greece, Netherlands, Hungary, Poland, Argentina, Colombia, Canada, South Africa, Tunisia and Tanzania.
